skills.name: Cooling Bubble
skills.description:
Charged cannon.
1st Sequence: Single shot.
2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.
3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.
When Charged ATK stack 3 hits on an enemy, it suffers 40.0% slower Move Speed for 5.0s.

skills.name: Beach Star
skills.description: Deals 20.0% more Physical DMG against enemies with Move Slow.
